nodes.text: The Palace of Piethet Brighteyes was a legendary treasure ship, which disappeared some centuries before the Galactic Civil War.

In 13 ABY, Captain "Hachat"—actually Garik Loran of the New Republic Intelligence Service—claimed to Imperial Admiral Kosh Teradoc to have found the vessel intact, as well as a willingness to divide the ship's treasure between himself and Teradoc.
